detail.title: Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Zebra
detail.desc: Adidas is back with their latest Yeezy Boost 350 V2. Fresh off the heels of NBA All-Star Weekend, these Yeezy's are nicknamed the 'Zebras,' and come in a classic white, black and red color scheme. Sporting a white-based Primeknit upper with black accents giving off a Zebra stripe vibe, “SPLY-350” displayed across the sides in red finished off by a translucent BOOST cushioned sole.
